mapper.insert: insert into t_common_configuration (id, brand_id, brand_name, type, provider_id, provider_name, manage_status, manage_method, buckle_point, send_order_weight, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, removed ) values (#{id}, #{brandId}, #{brandName}, #{type}, #{providerId}, #{providerName}, #{manageStatus}, #{manageMethod}, #{bucklePoint}, #{sendOrderWeight}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{removed})
